forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain and wind tapering to a few showers late. High 13C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with a steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 56F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 50F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 51F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine in the morning giving way to clouds and a few showers during the afternoon. High 11C. NE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later in the day. High 51F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
